name.ja: <ruby>原質の臨界超過<rt>マテリアクトル・クリティカル</rt></ruby>

text.en:
When a Spell/Trap Card, or monster effect, is activated: Add 1 of your cards attached to 1 "Materiactor" Xyz Monster you control to your hand, and if you do, negate the activation, then apply this effect based on the added card's type.
● Monster: Place 1 card from your hand on the bottom of the Deck.
● Spell: All "Materiactor" Xyz Monsters you currently control gain 1000 ATK.
● Trap: You can Set the added card.
You can only activate 1 "Materiactor Critical" per turn.
